dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S719 IS: To rename the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself and Mr. Daines) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To rename the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center.

section.header: Renaming of the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, as the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center

subsection.text: The Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, shall hereafter be known and designated as the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center.

Any reference in any law, map, regulation, map, document, paper, other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center.
